DOC.brief_summary: In Phase II trial subject nonrestorative sleep , PD 0200390 demonstrate positive treatment effect relative placebo primary endpoint , weekly version Restorative Sleep Questionnaire ( RSQ-W ) . In study , dose-response relationship vary dos PD 0200390 use Restorative Sleep Questionnaire ( RSQ-W ) , explore Nonrestorative Sleep subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Double-blind , Parallel Group , Placebo-Controlled Outpatient Trial PD 00200390 Adults With Nonrestorative Sleep
DOC.criteria: Awake unrestored unrefreshed , associated significant distress impairment social , occupational , important area function daytime , least 3 night past 3 month prior screen Selfreport wake sleep onset < 45 min past 3 mo ; selfreport latency sleep onset < 20 min past 3 mo PSG ( Polysomnography ) sleep criterion wake sleep onset < 45 min ; Latency persistent sleep < 20 min . MAP ( Multivariable Apnea Risk index ) index > = 0.5 screen BMI = > 32 kg/m2 History presence breathing related disorder PSG finding consistent periodic limb movement disorder , narcolepsy dyssomnia parasomnia include apneahypopnea index > 10/hr ; period limb movement arousal index > 10/hr .
